title: The London prodigall As it was plaide by the Kings Maiesties seruants. By VVilliam Shakespeare,
author: Shakespeare, William, 1564-1616, attributed name.
publisher: Printed by T[homas] C[reede] for Nathaniel Butter, and are to be sold neere S. Austins gate, at the signe of the pyde Bull,
notes: First word of title is xylographic.
Reproduction of the original in the Folger Shakespeare Library.
